sentence.Network_en: The sunken sailing-boat was a glimmer of white on the bottom.
sentence.Network_cn: 沉没的帆船在海底闪烁着白光。

sentence.Network_en: They looked pale and unhealthy, with unwashed hair and sunken cheeks.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们脸色苍白，精神不振，头发脏乱，两颊深陷。

sentence.Network_en: This sighting occurred during my dive to a sunken wreck off Sardinia.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是我在撒丁岛附近的沉船残骸处潜水时所见的景象。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: past participle of sink

entry.def: Sunken ships have sunk to the bottom of a sea, ocean, or lake.

example.ex: The sunken sailing-boat was a glimmer of white on the bottom...
example.tran: 沉没的帆船在海底闪烁着白光。
试着潜入水下找寻沉没的财宝。

entry.tran: (花园、公路等)低于周围地面的，低洼处的
entry.def: Sunken gardens, roads, or other features are below the level of their surrounding area.

example.ex: Steps lead down to the sunken garden...
The room was dominated by a sunken bath.
example.tran: 嵌入地面的浴缸占了房间的大半空间。

entry.def: Sunken eyes, cheeks, or other parts of the body curve inwards and make you look thin and unwell.

example.ex: Her eyes were sunken and black-ringed.

sentences.sentence: "hunger gave their faces a sunken look"

means.word_mean: 2. under water; e.g. at the bottom of a body of water;

auth_sentence.content: Around the bay are sunken ruins of other seaports.
auth_sentence.res_content: Around the bay are sunken ruins of other seaports.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Around the bay are sunken ruins of other seaports.

auth_sentence.content: His eyes are sunken in, his mouth gaping open.
auth_sentence.res_content: His eyes are sunken in, his mouth gaping open.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His eyes are sunken in, his mouth gaping open.

means.word_mean: 沉没的, 沉入水底的

sentences.en: We’ve putting a sunken bath in our bathroom.
sentences.cn: 我们在浴室里安装了一只埋入地面的浴缸。

sentences.en: She looked old and thin with sunken cheeks and hollow eyes.
sentences.cn: 她看上去又老又瘦, 脸颊凹陷, 眼圈发黑。
